etomica.modules.vle

Class MeterPressure2

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataSourceScalar
      • etomica.modules.vle.MeterPressure2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataSource, IEtomicaDataSource

    public class MeterPressure2
extends DataSourceScalar
    Meter for evaluation of the soft-potential pressure in a box. Requires that temperature be set in order to calculation ideal-gas contribution to pressure; default is to use zero temperature, which causes this contribution to be omitted.

    • Method Detail

      • setPotentialMaster

        public void setPotentialMaster(IPotentialMaster newPotentialMaster)
        Sets the integrator associated with this instance. The pressure is calculated for the box the integrator acts on and integrator's temperature is used for the ideal gas contribution.

      • getPotentialMaster

        public IPotentialMaster getPotentialMaster()
        Returns the integrator associated with this instance. The pressure is calculated for the box the integrator acts on and integrator's temperature is used for the ideal gas contribution.

      • isIncludeLrc

        public boolean isIncludeLrc()
        Indicates whether calculated energy should include long-range correction for potential truncation (true) or not (false).

      • getDataAsScalar

        public double getDataAsScalar()
        Computes total pressure in box by summing virial over all pairs, and adding ideal-gas contribution.
